rules_text:
Suspend 2–{1}{R}{W} [i](Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{R}{W} and exile it with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)[/i]
Whenever Timescape Tactician enters or you cast a spell from exile, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains lifelink until end of turn.
notes: Trigger could change to Whenever you cast a spell from exile, in keeping with the change to the archetype.
